sheet.name: en
sheet.text: Yo Tails. Can you tell if there's anything special about the ruins with this symbol?
I can't be sure without a proper analysis, but it doesn't seem remarkable.
What is remarkable is the data retention after all these years. The corruption is negligible, and the maps are so accurate!
Not to mention the way they can imprint the map data directly into the user's mind! It's hard enough explaining yourself to your peers, let alone some long-distant civilizations!
Yeah. Too bad they can't give us all the answers to the islands' mysteries. You're right, though. Pretty amazing to have a civilization based on brain-power.
